p:
Single‐cell RNA sequencing data revealed that ACE2 was highly expressed in kidney tubule cells, suggesting that the kidney was at high risk of coronavirus invasion.
62 Moreover, compared with non‐ICU patients, ICU patients had higher plasma levels of IL‐2, IL‐7, IL‐10, GSCF, IP10, MCP1, MIP1A and TNF‐α, suggesting that the cytokine storm may be associated with disease severity.
2
